title: Coordinator, Production Finance, Italy
overview: The Production Finance Coordinator in Netflix's Rome office will provide comprehensive daily support, process accounts payables, facilitate communication with external partners, and optimize workflows for the Production Finance team in Italy.
description:

extras.title: Responsibilities:
content: Comprehensive daily support for the Production Finance Team

Partner with Production Finance Associates and Managers to process accounts payables, track project cash forecasting and funding, maintain multiple internal reporting tools and systems as well as general ad hoc projects
Inform internal cross-functional teams with project updates

extras.title: Requirements:
content: A minimum of three years work experience in finance or accounting, preferably in production or entertainment

The ideal candidate must thrive in a fast-paced environment, possess a high level of intellectual curiosity, a focus on generating results and exhibit the highest personal and professional standards of integrity and ethics
Candidates must be self-motivated, disciplined and highly organized
Strong multi-tasking ability. High aptitude and enthusiasm for complex problem solving and analysis

Passion for entertainment and finance is a must
Strong Excel or Google Sheet skills
